name: Flippy Gun
description:
Flip the gun as high and as many times as you can! Flip the gun many times per jump to earn bullets to unlock new guns with. Flip the gun past the clouds, planets, and astronauts to experience a fun, action-adventure arcade game like no other.

Features:
• Flipping Guns
• Unlimited Heights
• Infinite gameplay
• Global High Scores list
• Unlock different guns
• Free to Play

How to Play:
Tap and hold to rotate the gun. Land on the barrel of the gun to shoot a bullet down and propel to higher distances. Propel your gun high enough and you may find yourself at the top of the Flippy Gun leaderboard.
